coffees.name: Coffea Suarez
coffees.desc: A fruit driven espresso from the West Valley region of Costa Rica. Plenty of stewed peach and berry flavours, hints of sweet lemon akin to limoncello and a cocoa bassline, this is an espresso to keep everyone happy.

coffees.name: Macho
coffees.desc: Our second Macho lot for the season, and this time we have the red honey processed lot providing a heavier, creamy body with sweet honeycomb flavours and a sprinkling of hazelnuts.

coffees.name: Kamwangi
coffees.desc: This is one fruit filled espresso! From citrus fruits, such as orange, grapefruit and clementine, to berries of the black, blue and red variety, this is fruit turned up to 11, all wrapped up in a silky smooth body.

coffees.name: La Colmenita
coffees.desc: A completely balanced and approachable espresso from the Huehuetenango region of Guatemala. Nougat dominates the cup with hints of nectarine and orange sitting alongside a white chocolate sweetness.
